page.title: 14POPULATION
page.content: POPULATION The population has been and still is fairly static. The Register of Electors dated 15th February 1984 which covers this part of Stanton totalled 147 people approximately. The population is fairly evenly spread although it would appear that most inhabitants are mainly of adult status. There are some younger children, schoolchildren and teenagers. There also exists a very mixed social structure which includes land owners, tenant farmers, bailiffs, private home owners and those in rented accommodation.Although there are some service personnel and some newcomers into the area they seem to be well accepted and integrated into the lives and affairs of the community. The oldest inhabitant is in her nineties. .
